name: 極魔界村
summary: Ultimate Ghosts'n Goblins (Japanese: 極魔界村 Hepburn: Gokumakaimura?, lit. "Extreme Hell Village") is a video game in Capcom's Ghosts'n Goblins series released for the PlayStation Portable on August 3, 2006 in Japan. Ultimate Ghosts'n Goblins is the first game in the series to employ 3D graphics, while maintaining much of the 2D gameplay mechanics of the earlier games.[1] It also marks the return of the series' project head, Tokuro Fujiwara.
